title: Taiwan Air Force Loses Contact With Pilot After F-16 Crashes on Training Mission
sub_head: Lost jet marks the sixth major incident involving a Taiwanese military aircraft since 2020
body:
TAIPEI——A Taiwanese pilot is missing after his jet fighter plunged into the sea while on a training mission Tuesday, the second major incident involving a Taiwanese military aircraft over the past year and sixth since the start of 2020.
The Taiwan Air Force said it lost contact with a single-seat F-16 jet fighter off the island’s coast at around 3:23 p.m. local time, roughly half an hour after it took off on a training mission from an airfield in the southwestern county of Chiayi.
